column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Was excited to try this place mainly for the fruity pebbles French toast
column3: and they said they don't do brunch on weekdays. Was pretty disappointed. As a vegetarian
column4: the options were kind of slim. I ended up getting the mushroom and Brussels sprout flatbread. It was really mediocre
column5: wouldn't got back for it. The crust was basically pita bread
column7: and the veggies were minced giving it a really weird flavor and texture. All in all
column8: not sure I'd go back - unless it was to try the brunch menu. The only highlight was how nice the service was and the trendy ambiance.
